name: Castle 123
description:
[!] NOTE: The game takes a BIG amount of time to load. I'll try to fix that ASAP [!]

Also, on a less important (but still important) note, I will work on doing a proper cover (kinda done), taking some screenshots (done) and better reworking this page in the couple of weeks :3

--- DESCRIPTION ---

Another short game made for the Summer Santa Jam for Voidsay by Marxy 37. Drag the lanterns and light up all crystals in this small & cute puzzle game. I hope the game is fun :3

---A SHORT LETTER TO VOIDSAY---

"Hi Voidsay, i hope you like this small little game!!

When you said "A bit of light shining into my dungeon" i immediately knew what to make: A game about light in a medieval settings. And yes, it may not have big explosions or a nice story that we both have hoped for,  but for a week project it has turned out quite nicely I'd say, even if it's just 8 small levels!!  :3

The only thing i couldn't make is the UI, that even with the spare amount of time i didn't managed to make it look good. I'll keep experimenting to see if i can manage to improve it.

Alright, unless i'm forgetting something, that should be all i wanted to say. Again, hope u have fun, stay well, and have an happy Summer Christmas.  (^u^)

Your Santa, With Love. -Marxy 37"
